name: Mogul Inc.
description: Operator of artificial intelligence-enabled business-to-business candidate sourcing platform designed for recruiters to comprehensively and inclusively source candidates. The company's diverse recruitment platform and resources attract diverse talent from entry-level to executive and board-level worldwide through its software and executive recruitment services, enabling clients to achieve their goals and cultivate meaningful success.
one_liner: Operator of artificial intelligence-enabled business-to-business candidate sourcing platform designed for recruiters to comprehensively and inclusively source candidates. The company's diverse recruitment platform and resources attract diverse talent from entry-level to executive and board-level worldwide through its software and executive recruitment services, enabling clients to achieve their goals and cultivate meaningful success.
